Mnuchin defends Trump's coronavirus response as officials ramp up efforts
Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin defended President Donald Trump on Sunday amid ongoing criticism over the administration's response to the coronavirus pandemic. "People misinterpreted his comments," Mnuchin told ABC's "This Week" after the president during an Oval Office speech misstated several elements of a new policy restricting travel from Europe to combat the spread of the virus.

In a statement, the county said those numbers are expected to grow and health officials urged everyone to wash hands and follow social distancing rules, if not stay indoors completely.
